content.question: The object in Image 2 best illustrates which of the following cultural processes in the period circa 1450â€“1750?

choices.label: The spread of Ethiopian cultural traditions in West Africa
The influence of the Columbian Exchange on artistic traditions
The development of religious syncretism as cultural traditions spread
The intensification of pre-existing religious conflicts and rivalries

content.answer: The development of religious syncretism as cultural traditions spread

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
